thread.title: Modern Promos Hires Dave Schiesser as Vice President of Growth Strategy

author: cnbc.com
title: Modern Promos Hires Dave Schiesser as Vice President of Growth Strategy
text:
MINNEAPOLIS, Feb. 13, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Modern Promos is pleased to announce that the full-service brand activation agency has hired Dave Schiesser as vice president of growth strategy. Dave will be based in Los Angeles and will oversee the opening of Modern Promos' new west coast office in L.A.
"Dave is a driven business development executive and we are delighted for him to bring his expertise to our team," says Jonathon Nelson, president of Modern Promos. "He has worked with leading global brands in the experiential marketing space, and he will be a huge asset to Modern Promos as we look to expand our West Coast presence in 2018."
With more than 20 years of experience and seen as a trusted advisor by many in the marketing and business development arenas, Dave brings an abundance of knowledge and successful business development tactics to the Modern Promos team. He has worked across a variety of industries and has spent extensive time in the CPG, communications and beverage industries.
Dave will be a leading executive within the growth division of Modern Promos, which includes sales, business development and lead generation. He will be based in Los Angeles, where Modern Promos intends to open a satellite office in 2018.
In his spare time, Dave enjoys volunteer coaching youth baseball and softball. He implements the same team-centered approach in the business world and is excited to join the growing team at Modern Promos.
About Modern Promos
Modern Promos is one of the nation's top brand activation agencies and has worked with hundreds of North America's biggest brands. As a full-service brand activation agency specializing in impactful brand experiences, Modern Promos partners both directly with brands and with advertising, public relations and marketing agencies. We create effective and efficient experiential campaigns that bring brands to life while leaving a lasting impression on consumers. With a nationwide network of more than 35,000 brand ambassadors, Modern Promos has the knowledge and staff to produce and execute immersive, impactful, creative brand experiences. Learn more at www.modernpromos.com .
